title: Reported Speech - Statements - 2
instructions: Put the sentences into reported speech.
exa: She doesn't go shopping here.<br \/>She said she didn't go shopping there.<br \/>I will help you.<br \/>He said he would help me.

contents.starter: The policeman said to me that
alters: they would not believe my story.

contents.starter: I saw it in the dog's eyes that

contents.longsent: We didn't go to the party.
alters: they hadn't gone to the party.

contents.starter: My girlfriend said to me that
alters: she had not saved my number.

contents.starter: My colleague whispered to me that

contents.longsent: I'm sorry that I woke you up too early this morning.
alters: she was sorry that she had woken me up too early that morning.
